'''''Awaken the Residual Pari in the Fravashi Trees''''' is a [[World Quest]] in [[Gavireh Lajavard]], [[Sumeru]]. It is part of the {{Quest|Pale Fire}}.

==Start Location==
<gallery>
World Quest Awaken the Residual Pari in the Fravashi Trees (Hangeh Afrasiyab) Start Location.png|Start location
World Quest Awaken the Residual Pari in the Fravashi Trees (Hangeh Afrasiyab) Start Location Context.png|Additional context
</gallery>

==Steps==
# Let Sorush awaken the residual Pari in the [[Fravashi Tree]]
# Talk to the residual Pari in the Fravashi Tree
# Defeat the monsters {{Enemy List|Thundercraven Rifthound*1;Rockfond Rifthound Whelp*1;Thundercraven Rifthound Whelp*1}}
# Talk to the residual Pari in the Fravashi Tree

==Dialogue==
{{Quest Description|The residual Pari residing within the Fravashi Trees are still trapped in obsessions of the past. It seems that Sorush can awaken them...}}
{{Transclude|Awaken the Residual Pari in the Fravashi Trees (North Tunigi Hollow 1)|first meet|section=1}}
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Approach the Fravashi Tree)
:'''Paimon:''' There's a Fravashi Tree here too!

;(Talk to the Pari)
:'''Residual Pari of the Forest:''' Shhhh, be quiet! You won't want to startle those dark puppies there.
:'''Residual Pari of the Forest:''' Oopsie... There's only one way left to go, then.

;(Talk to the Pari after defeating the enemies)
:'''Residual Pari of the Forest:''' Whoa, you must be one powerful Yasnapati!
:'''Residual Pari of the Forest:''' Phew, now we can relax!
{{Dialogue End}}
{{Transclude|Awaken the Residual Pari in the Fravashi Trees (North Tunigi Hollow 1)|first clear|section=1}}
